P052037.project_name: Ho Chi Minh City Environmental Sanitation (Nhieu Loc-Thi Nghe Basin) Project

project_abstract.cdata: The development objective of the Ho Chi Minh City Environmental Sanitation (Nhieu Loc-Thi Nghe Basin) Project is to reduce the incidence of flooding and increase the collection of wastewater in the Nhieu Loc Thi Nghe (NLTN) Basin in Ho Chi Minh City (HCMC), in an environmentally and financially sustainable manner. The project restructuring involves a minor changes related to project financing. A change in the withdrawal conditions for the additional credit will be made to allow for the retroactive financing of eligible payments to be made prior to May 25, 2010 but on or after May 25, 2009. This change will allow for retroactive financing to be made for up to one year from the date of the additional credit signing. The reallocation is necessary to so that the final disbursement allocations will be consistent with the actual disbursed amounts. The credit closing date was extended several times and in March 2010 an additional financing credit of SDR58 million was approved, together with a revised closing date of December 31, 2011.
